description: Installs OMI server with PowerShell provider from deb packages, and enables a winrm endpoint. Requires OpenSSL 1.1.0

build_omi.description: Builds OMI server package from source. Default is to use prebuilt packages.

enable_ntlm_authentication.description: Configures OMI listener for NTLM / SPNEGO auth. Default is to enable
